sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const SuccessPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ FullName: "", RequiredID: "", RequiredTitle: "", Role: "", RequiredCreationDate: "", VendorID: "", ImmigrationStatus: "", ContractType: "", SubmissionDate: "", RequiredSubmissionEndDate: "", CandidateCurrentLocation: "", ContactNumber: "", RecruiterName: "", State: "", SubmissionStatus: "", VendorRate: "", CandidatePayRate: "", BillRateMargin: "", ResumeSource: "", EmailId: "", LinkedInID: "", EmployerInformation: "", ProfessionalReferences: "", DOB: "", RequiredSkills: "", ResumeFormatingNeeded: "", FormatedBy: "", Password: "", PasswordConfirmation: "", Resume: null, // Handle file uploads separately if needed }); const [uploadedFileName, setUploadedFileName] = useState(""); // State to hold the uploaded file's name for display const [showPopup, setShowPopup] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { id, value, files } = e.target; if (e.target.type === "file") { const file = files[0]; // Get the uploaded file const maxFileSize = 10 * 1024 * 1024; // 10 MB in bytes const allowedTypes = [ "application/pdf", // PDF "application/msword", // DOC "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document", // DOCX ]; // Check if the file type is allowed and the file size does not exceed 10 MB if (!allowedTypes.includes(file.type)) { alert("File type must be PDF or DOC/DOCX"); return; // Exit the function if file type is not allowed } else if (file.size > maxFileSize) { alert("File size should not exceed 10 MB"); return; // Exit the function if file size is too large } else { // Update state with the file if type and size are within the limits setFormData({ ...formData, Resume: file }); setUploadedFileName(file.name); // Update state to display the file name } } else { // Handle other input changes setFormData({ ...formData, [id]: value }); } }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Check if all fields are filled // const allFieldsFilled = Object.values(formData).every((value) => { // if (typeof value === "string") { // return value.trim() !== ""; // } // return value !== null; // Assuming 'null' is only possible for file inputs // }); const allTextFieldsFilled = Object.entries(formData).every( ([key, value]) => { if (key !== "Resume") { // Check all fields except Resume return typeof value === "string" ? value.trim() !== "" : true; } return true; // Assume non-string fields (like Resume) are optional or handled separately } ); // Check if the Resume has been uploaded const isResumeUploaded = formData.Resume !== null; if (!allTextFieldsFilled || !isResumeUploaded) { alert("Please fill out all fields before submitting."); return; } console.log(JSON.stringify(formData)); // Convert formData to JSON setShowPopup(true); }; const handleClosePopup = () => { setShowPopup(false); window.location.reload(); // Reloads the page }; return (

Employee Information Form

or drag and drop

PDF, DOC up to 10MB

{showPopup && (

Submission Successful

Your form has been submitted successfully.

)}
); }; export default SuccessPage;
